```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
trains <- read_csv("raw-data/train.csv", 
                   col_names = TRUE,
                   col_types = cols(.default = col_double()))
trains
trains %>% 
  group_by(treatment) %>% 
  summarize(meanAttitude = mean(attitude))

trains %>% 
  ggplot(aes(republican, att_start)) + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1)
```
